{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Hawking |model=HWR54G |revision=M |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=04/22/2004 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf=AboCom |manuf_model=ARM914 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=MQ4ARM914 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.8 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88W8510 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=Fujitsu |fla1_model=29LV800TE-90PFTN |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=4 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W981616CH-6 |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8510 |wi1_chip2_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6060 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=hawking,Marvell-AP32 |default_ssid_regex=^hawking$,,,^Marvell-AP32$ |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui=00:E0:98 |oui_eth=00:E0:98 }} [http://hawkingtech.com/products/legacy_products/wireless_routers/repeaters/hwr54g.html?curr_tab=support Support page]
"M01-914M+-A10" is silkscreened on the board.
This board is highly homologous to the [[HotBrick SoHo 401W]] / [[SerComm IP806SM]]. This may be indicative of usage of the same [http://investor.marvell.com/phoenix.zhtml?c=120802&p=irol-newsArticle&ID=481084&highlight= Marvell reference design] or evidence of SerComm involvement in the design (likely). :According to djb, [http://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/files/archive/djnetbsd_old/Marvell%20Libertas%20Wireless%20Routers.htm the board was designed by SerComm]. The [http://www.abocom.com.tw/product_download.aspx?name_id=D9FD1EA37934644AE6091A55FB5080FD firmware for the ARM914] corroborates this as the firmware contains strings indicating SerComm authorship. The manual follows the typical SerComm format.
The default SSID is '''hawking''' (all lower case). While booting, the device may temporarily take on the SSID of '''Marvell-AP32'''.
A sample serial number for the device is HABTR54GM05174369.
[http://web.archive.org/web/20070320054039/http://www.hawkingtech.com/support/details.php?CatID=19&FamID=13&ProdID=303 Hawking support page for the HWR54G (via archive.org)] :'''Revision M will have a '''serial number starting with the following characters: HABTR54GM...
